trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Kintone | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Kintone | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Kintone with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Kintone with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Kintone
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Kintone

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526796).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526796).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Kintone.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Kintone.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Kintone single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A Kintone single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Kintone will be able to single sign into the application at your Kintone company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Kintone will be able to single sign into the application at your Kintone company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Kintone
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Kintone

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Kintone
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Kintone

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Kintone.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Kintone.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Kintone, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Kintone, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Kintone**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Kintone**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Kintone**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Kintone**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Kintone
trans-unit.target: Kintone

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Kintone with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Kintone with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Kintone** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Kintone** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Kintone** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Kintone** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Kintone Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://company.kintone.com*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Kintone Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://company.kintone.com*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Kintone** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Kintone** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your **Kintone** company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your **Kintone** company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Click **Users & System Administration**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Users & System Administration**.

trans-unit.source: Users & System Administration
trans-unit.target: Users & System Administration

trans-unit.source: Under **System Administration \> Security** click **Login**.
trans-unit.target: Under **System Administration \> Security** click **Login**.

trans-unit.source: Login
trans-unit.target: Login

trans-unit.source: Click **Enable SAML authentication**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Enable SAML authentication**.

trans-unit.source: SAML Authentication
trans-unit.target: SAML Authentication

trans-unit.source: In the SAML Authentication section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the SAML Authentication section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: SAML Authentication
trans-unit.target: SAML Authentication

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kintone** dialog page, copy the **Remote Login URL** value, and then paste it into the **Login URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kintone** dialog page, copy the **Remote Login URL** value, and then paste it into the **Login URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kintone** dialog page, copy the **Remote Logout URL** value, and then paste it into the **Logout URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kintone** dialog page, copy the **Remote Logout URL** value, and then paste it into the **Logout URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Click **Browse** to upload your downloaded certificate.
trans-unit.target: Click **Browse** to upload your downloaded certificate.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Kintone, they must be provisioned into Kintone.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Kintone, they must be provisioned into Kintone.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Kintone, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Kintone, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **Kintone** company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **Kintone** company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Click **Setting**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Setting**.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Click **Users & System Administration**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Users & System Administration**.

trans-unit.source: User & System Administration
trans-unit.target: User & System Administration

trans-unit.source: Under **User Administration**, click **Departments & Users**.
trans-unit.target: Under **User Administration**, click **Departments & Users**.

trans-unit.source: Department & Users
trans-unit.target: Department & Users

trans-unit.source: Click **New User**.
trans-unit.target: Click **New User**.

trans-unit.source: New Users
trans-unit.target: New Users

trans-unit.source: In the **New User** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **New User** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: New Users
trans-unit.target: New Users

trans-unit.source: Type a **Display Name**, **Login Name**, **New Password**, **Confirm Password**, **E-mail Address** and other details of a valid AAD account you want to provision into the related texboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type a **Display Name**, **Login Name**, **New Password**, **Confirm Password**, **E-mail Address** and other details of a valid AAD account you want to provision into the related texboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other Kintone user account creation tools or APIs provided by Kintone to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other Kintone user account creation tools or APIs provided by Kintone to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Kintone, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Kintone, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Kintone **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Kintone **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
